featured.text: Very few people, no matter how intelligent or experienced, can 28 all the possibilities or outcomes of a policy or a course of action within just a short period of time.
The scientists then investigated the possibility that these small levels of alcohol could be detected by an ABT.
Peanuts is sad over the possibility of losing his grandfather.
Another possibility is simply that we may acquire languages differently as children than we do as adults.

definition.zh_def: 可能性；發生的機會或潛力。
definition.en_def: The state or fact of being possible; a chance that something may happen.
definition.example: There is a possibility of rain tomorrow.
